sense.def:
A scout
ali
a boy scout
je pripadnik skavtske organizacije, ki fante navaja na disciplino in jih uči praktičnih znanj.

A scout
je tudi oseba, ki jo pošljejo nekam, da bi ugotovila, kakšen je položaj sovražnikove vojske.

seg.quote: The scouts reported that the enemy was advancing.

sense.def:
To scout around for something
pomeni nekaj iskati na različnih krajih.

seg.quote: We'll scout around to see if anyone is here.
